articles.title: Suspect in custody after deadly string of random shootings in Detroit: Police
articles.description: A single gunman randomly shot four victims, three fatally, on Sunday morning.
articles.content:
The city of Detroit was on edge after police said a single gunman randomly shot four victims, three fatally, in 2 hours and 25 minutes Sunday morning.
The sole survivor of the killing rampage, an 80… [+3521 chars]
